title: Ecofeminism - Global Approach
description:
CFRO Ecoshock Show: ECOFEMINISM: Global Approach

Series: 	 		CFRO Ecoshock Show  Download Series Podcast
Subtitle: 	 		Western domination of women & nature - 2 3rd world responses
Length (h:m:s):  		01:00:00
Language: 	 		English
Date Recorded: 	 		2007-07-03
Location Recorded: 		Vancouver, Canada
Featured Speakers/Commentators: Dr. Rosemary Ruether
Producer: 	 		Alex Smith
Broadcast Restictions: 	 	For non-profit use only.

Summary: Ecofeminism: what is it? How is it working in the real world? Dr. Rosemary Ruether, theologian, gives scholarly, rather secular, speech July 3rd, 07. Wise woman on the problems & gifts of ecofeminism. Lives of two ecofeminists: from India, and Brazil
Credits: Rosemary Radford Ruether, author or editor of more than 40 books, many on ecofeminism.
Recorded by Radio Ecoshock at www.ecoshock.org
End song is "Wheel of the Year" by Shirakammen.
